definition: name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: To know when Michael Jordan is renowned the world over and Kobe Bryant just be something.
sentences.chinese: 要知道那時喬丹已是名滿天下而科比剛剛有點名堂。

sentences.english: Many years past, a lot of directors become renowned the world over, back to Sicily.
sentences.chinese: 多少年過去，多多成了名滿天下的導演，重回西西里。
